title: Ticket #3483: Microsecond time stamps in user log
description: Currently the user log writes timestamps in one second granularity. Several times, for peformance testing and debugging, I've wanted to see better granularity for these timestamps. I've implemented this a couple of times, and thrown the code away, I'd just like to get it in the code now, #ifdef'ed out, so it is there when I need it the next time. Don't want to break any log readers out there, so this will just be internal, for developer use.
check_ins: 2013-Feb-05 11:52   Check-in [34856]: Optionally write microseconds to user log when ifdef'd in #3483 off by default (By Greg Thain )
creator: gthain
